color.description: The main color for the item, if omitted the default color from the theme will be used.

display.description: General display options of the Bar chart: title, legend and mode option

categoryLabels.description: Show or hide the category labels in the chart

modeOption.description: Show or hide the mode option

values.description: Show or hide the values in the chart: none, percentage or absolute

ignore.description: Item IDs to ignore. If not provided, all other items will be filtered when something is changed on the current one.

label.description: Label in format {locale: "label"}, for example, {en: "Total Revenue"}
Label

customTooltip.description: Tooltip interactivity option, in format {locale: "tooltip"}, for example, {en: "Total Revenue"}

bins.description: Bin definition. Can be used when a numeric column is used as a category.

number.description: Defines the range of the bins

color.description: Color of the column. Only used when multiple measures are defined.

currency.description: Currency code. Is only used when the column subtype is currency.

duration.description: Duration definition. Is only used when the column subtype is duration.

format.description: Column format. Used when the column type is datetime or numeric.

label.description: Label in format {locale: "label"}, for example, {en: "Total Revenue"}

position.description: Position of the legend. Only available when the legend is shown.

size.description: Size of the legend. Only available when the legend is shown.

type.description: Type of the legend. Only available when the legend is shown.

mode.description: Mode of the Donut chart: donut or pie

roundedCorners.description: Set rounded corners of the slices

startWithSubType.description: If it's set fine-tunes the 'mode' option. When it's 'pie' or 'half-pie the 'mode' will become 'pie' otherwise 'donut'.

editDarkOrLight.description: Dark or light theme for edit

id.description: Id of the theme, like "seasonal", "urban", etc.
